name: SPACE EVADE
description:
SPACE EVADE

Music: Rumble by @AsheSnyder

Newgrounds page: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/784403

Source code: https://github.com/anactualhuman/space-evade

Avoid the randomly generated enemies and collect to keep the timer in check.

Collecting is a double-edged sword, it increases your timer but also increases the speed of the enemies.

Highscore is your highest total amount of time survived.

Tested for Firefox, Chrome, Edge, Opera and Basilisk. It should work fine with just about any modern web browser.

Made as a project to learn C++ and SDL2, converted to WebAssembly using Emscripten.
